parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.55

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes all MP event handlers of the given type which were added by [[addMPEventHandler]]. Command needs to be executed only on one PC for MP event handler to be removed globally.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> objectName '''removeAllMPEventHandlers''' event

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> objectName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> event: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> player '''removeAllMPEventHandlers''' "mpkilled"; </code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[:Category:Event Handlers|EventHandlers list]], [[addMPEventHandler]], [[removeMPEventHandler]]
</value></part></template>
